patthana16.90:4.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ arūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naarūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.90:4.3: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … avigate cha.
patthana16.90:5.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ naarūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanaarūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
